entry.headline: SOA Software Announces Unified Governance for IBM WebSphere Business Services Fabric
entry.body: LOS ANGELES, CA, Nov 15 (MARKET WIRE) -- SOA Software, a leading SOA and cloud services Governance provider, today announced the availability of a comprehensive suite of governance products to help customers successfully plan, build and run applications for the IBM WebSphere Business Services Fabric. SOA Software's products provide Unified SOA Governance Automation for the IBM WebSphere Business Services Fabric. This allows customers to confidently use IBM WebSphere products as part of a heterogeneous enterprise SOA environment sharing services with other commercial SOA platforms including Microsoft, RedHat, Oracle, and SAP. Unified SOA Governance breaks down into distinct areas; Planning Governance is about making sure that you are building the right things, Development Governance is about making sure you're building them the right way, and Operational Governance is about ensuring that what you've built is behaving correctly. "We are very pleased to be able to announce this comprehensive set of product integrations that help customers deliver uniform, consistent governance of WebSphere centric SOA programs," said Alistair Farquharson, chief technology officer of SOA Software. "The strong collaboration we have with the IBM engineering teams allowed us to bring fully functional products with comprehensive integration, to help our joint customers ensure the success of their SOA initiatives." IBM Customers add SOA Software's Unified SOA Governance Automation solution to the IBM WebSphere Business Services Fabric to: -- Ensure that services they identify, design and build using the WebSphere Business Services Fabric products are relevant to and consumable by applications they plan, design, build and deploy using other technologies like Microsoft or Oracle, or buy from other vendors like SAP. -- Make services they expose from applications running on WebSphere Business Services Fabric products visible to and compliant with enterprise policies defined, enforced and audited across other platforms; and make services they design and build using other platforms like Microsoft and open source environments visible to and compliant with enterprise policies defined, enforced and audited across their WebSphere Business Services Fabric applications. -- Promote and ensure consistent alignment between demand from service consumers and the supply of services through Consumer Contract Provisioning. SOA Software's platform-independent Unified SOA Governance Automation solution promotes the use of best-practices throughout an enterprise SOA program regardless of where services and consumers are designed, built, deployed and operated. Portfolio Manager, Repository Manager, Service Manager and Policy Manager integrate seamlessly with development and runtime products from most commercial platforms including IBM, SAP, Microsoft, and Oracle, as well as RedHat and other open source providers. Policy Manager provides a powerful policy framework for operational, compliance and Quality of Service policy definition, attachment and auditing. Service Manager provides a set of intermediaries that abstract service and application containers from the implementation, enforcement and auditing of operational, security, management and QoS policies. Policy Manager is available with specific versions targeted and specific platforms, and Service Manager is available for a wide range of service and application containers. SOA Software's governance solution for IBM WebSphere Business Services Fabric includes: -- Service Manager Agent for IBM WebSphere Teamworks -- Service Manager Agent for IBM WebSphere Process Server -- Service Manager Agent for IBM WebSphere Enterprise Service Bus -- Policy Manager for WebSphere Service Registry and Repository (WSRR) -- Service Manager Agent for IBM WebSphere Application Server SOA Software also offers comprehensive governance solutions for other IBM products with: -- Policy Manager for WebSphere DataPower -- Service Manager Agent for IBM WebSphere Message Broker -- Repository Manager Asset Adapter for IBM Rational ClearCase -- Repository Manager Asset Adapter for IBM Rational ClearQuest -- Policy Manager for Rational Team Concert -- Portfolio Manager for IBM WebSphere Business Services Fabric SOA Software's SOLA products, is the leading Mainframe SOA solution for CICS and IMS. These products combine to provide the most comprehensive solution for ensuring consistent application, implementation and enforcement of policy across the diverse products in the IBM WebSphere Business Services Fabric. For more information please visit us at http://www.soa.com/ibm. Availability and Pricing SOA Software's governance products for the IBM WebSphere Business Services Fabric are available today, with prices starting at $50,000. About SOA Software SOA Software is a leading provider of unified SOA and cloud services governance products that enable organizations to plan, build, and run cloud and enterprise services and PaaS applications. The world's largest companies including Bank of America, Pfizer, and Verizon use SOA Software solutions to transform their business. For more information, please visit http://www.soa.com. SOA Software, Atmosphere, Policy Manager, Portfolio Manager, Repository Manager, Service Manager, and SOLA are trademarks of SOA Software, Inc. All other product and service names mentioned herein are the trademarks of their respective owners. For more information, please contact: pressroom@soa.com Contact: SOA Software pressroom@soa.com Copyright 2010, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: OptumHealth Debuts OptumizeMe Fitness App to Help Microsoft Windows Phone 7 Users Connect and Compete for Better Health
entry.body:
OptumHealth Debuts OptumizeMe Fitness App to Help Microsoft® Windows Phone 7 Users Connect and Compete for Better Health

OptumizeMe Turns Healthy Pursuits into Fun Fitness Challenges with Online Friends

Selected by Microsoft as a Premier Windows Phone 7 Launch App

OptumHealth, one of the nation’s largest health and wellness companies, today announced the release of the OptumizeMe mobile application. Designed exclusively for the many new Windows® Phone 7 devices, OptumizeMe helps people pursue their health goals through their own online social networks, where they can track their progress and issue fun fitness challenges to their friends, family and coworkers.

OptumizeMe, selected by Microsoft as a Premier Launch App, is designed to maximize the features of the Windows Phone 7 platform. It is available now, free of charge, at the Windows® Phone Marketplace. The app is part of the Microsoft Windows Phone 7 showcase.

With OptumizeMe, people can create and challenge each other to fitness competitions, and trade both encouragement and “digs” along the way. Users can network with friends using the app, or link to their existing social networks to create new fitness challenges. The application tracks their progress on challenges, and rewards them with virtual badges as they achieve their goals. OptumizeMe also uses the Windows Phone 7’s location capabilities to help fitness enthusiasts locate and join open challenges happening near them.

“If you’re the kind of person who lives life on the go, wants to increase your fitness and can’t resist a good challenge, OptumizeMe is the app for you,” said Rob Webb, CEO of OptumHealth Care Solutions. “It makes living a healthy lifestyle easier and more fun for people with Windows Phone 7 mobile devices by creating connections with friends who share similar fitness goals. Most of us already use our social networks to stay in touch with each other, so why not use them to share the experience of getting healthier together?”

According to a recent New England Journal of Medicine report, healthy behavior actually spreads through social connections. OptumizeMe links with online social networks like Facebook to make healthy activity a social activity. For example, OptumizeMe can post updates to a user’s Facebook wall to allow friends to monitor the person’s progress and post messages of support.

“Windows Phone 7 is backed by a rich developer ecosystem that is creating a variety of quality apps and games designed to help people get the most out of their phone,” said Todd Brix, senior director, Windows Phone Marketplace, Microsoft Corp. “OptumizeMe is a great example of the innovative apps available on Windows Phone Marketplace that take advantage of Windows Phone 7’s unique features and design.”

Sixty mobile operators in 30 countries will offer Windows Phone 7 mobile devices, available in the United States Nov. 8.

About OptumHealth

OptumHealth helps individuals navigate the health care system, finance their health care needs and achieve their health and well-being goals. The company’s personalized health advocacy and engagement programs tap a unique combination of capabilities that encompass public sector solutions, care solutions, behavioral solutions, specialty benefits and financial services. Serving nearly 60 million people, OptumHealth is one of the nation’s largest health and wellness businesses, and is a UnitedHealth Group (NYSE: UNH) company. More information about OptumHealth can be found at www.optumhealth.com.

Photos/Multimedia Gallery Available: http://www.businesswire.com/cgi-bin/mmg.cgi?eid=6508888lang=en

OptumHealthMedia Contact:Chuck Grothaus, 763-797-4790charles.grothaus@optumhealth.com

entry.headline: JPS Health Network Licenses TriZetto`s QicLink Extended Enterprise Solution to Automate and Improve Administrative Efficiency
entry.body:
JPS Health Network Licenses TriZetto’s QicLink Extended Enterprise Solution to Automate and Improve Administrative Efficiency

The TriZetto Group, Inc. today announced that JPS Health Network in Ft. Worth, Texas, has licensed TriZetto's QicLink Extended Enterprise™ software and services to improve the administrative efficiency of its information systems and automate more of its administrative processes in replacement of its existing system. Providing health coverage to 50,000 uninsured in Tarrant County, Texas, JPS expects to go live on TriZetto's QicLink™ system in Q1 of 2011.

“Our 10-year-old administration system was being phased-out, and we wanted something new that would better address our needs for user-friendliness, extensive EDI functionality and data import capabilities,” said Patty Angell, Director of Benefit Services for JPS. “We reviewed four different vendors and felt that the QicLink system spoke for itself, although our own opinion was supplemented with a glowing recommendation from one of our key providers. The QicLink system package licensed by JPS also includes the ClinicaLogic™, QicLink Workflow and QicLink Benefits Exchange integrated ancillary modules that support claims screening, claims automation and web-based access, respectively.

“JPS is the 109th payer to depend on the QicLink system to run its core business,” said Rob Scavo, President of TriZetto’s Emerging Markets Group. “I think JPS’s selection reflects the value customers see in the investments TriZetto has made to continually advance QicLink’s capabilities and the best-in-breed partner solutions we have brought to bear under the TriZetto Premier Partnership Program®. We have focused very sharply on expanding our solutions in concert with the increasingly sophisticated requirements of the benefits administration industry, the evolution of Integrated Healthcare Management and the demands of healthcare reform.”

About QicLink™

Specifically designed to serve the needs of benefits administrators, the TriZetto QicLink system is the industry-leading claims administration solution, using .NET technology, integrated Premier Partner solutions and proven application processes to drive administrative efficiency, enhance revenue growth and improve the cost and quality of care for the third-party administration market and the self-funded employer groups that they serve.

About JPS Health Network

JPS Health Network is Tarrant County’s tax-supported health care system, serving the area for more than a century with the mission to improve the health status of the families and individuals in the communities it serves. JPS has more than 4,500 employees who work at more than 50 locations throughout Tarrant County including John Peter Smith Hospital, health centers including three dedicated to women’s services, school-based health centers, Trinity Springs Pavilion for psychiatric services, a stand-alone center for cancer care and more. JPS is the first and only Level I Trauma Center for Tarrant County and is also home to the largest hospital-based family medicine residency program in the nation. For more information, please visit www.jpshealthnet.org.

About TriZetto

Founded in 1997, TriZetto is the leading privately held healthcare information technology company to the healthcare payer industry, with its technology touching half of the U.S. insured population. TriZetto’s vision for the industry, Integrated Healthcare Management, is the optimized coordination of benefits and care for healthcare consumers to improve the value of every healthcare dollar spent. The company's offerings include enterprise and component software, I.T. outsourcing services, business process outsourcing services and consulting that help payers transform and optimize their operations to enhance revenue growth, to drive administrative efficiency and to improve the cost and quality of care.

The TriZetto GroupRachel Tanner Lew, 303-495-7022rachel.lew@trizetto.comorSchwartz CommunicationsDavida Dinerman/Pauline Louie, 781-684-0770trizetto@schwartzcomm.com

entry.headline: REG-JP Morgan Chase Chase Doubles SBA Loans to Become #1 in U.S., Helps 3,300 Small Businesses in 2010
entry.body:
Chase Doubles SBA Loans to Become #1 in U.S., Helps 3,300 Small Businesses in 2010

Loans increase 170% from year earlier; dollar volume up 217%

Chase announced today that it more than doubled its Small Business Administration loan volume in fiscal 2010 to become the nation’s largest SBA lender, helping 250 more businesses than the next largest lender.

Chase’s 3,386 loans represent a 170% increase in SBA loans from a year earlier. Chase lent $434 million in SBA loans in fiscal 2010, up 217% and making it second-largest SBA lender in dollars.

“The SBA loan program allows us to reach thousands of small businesses that need the financing to run their businesses and meet their payroll, especially during these challenging times,” said Michael Cleary, head of Business Banking at Chase. “Helping small businesses grow is important because they are core to the U.S. economy.”

Chase’s SBA 7(a) and Express loans were a crucial part of its 37% increase in lending to small businesses through working capital, term loans for expansion, commercial mortgages, lines of credit, and business credit cards. Through the first three quarters of 2010, Chase lent $7.4 billion to businesses with sales of less than $20 million, up from $5.4 billion a year earlier.

Since last November, Chase also has hired more than 500 additional business bankers and approved more than $250 million in small business credit after giving rejected loans a second look.

In SBA lending, Chase ranked first in both dollars and loans in New York and was the top lender in loans in Arizona, Illinois and Indiana and in Dallas-Ft. Worth, Houston and San Antonio, Texas.

In total, Chase ranked within the top three in both number of loans and dollars in 12 local district offices.

entry.headline: Mimecast Launches Support for Microsoft BPOS, Extending the Business Benefits and Reducing the Risks of Migration
entry.body:
Mimecast Launches Support for Microsoft BPOS, Extending the Business Benefits and Reducing the Risks of Migration

Integrated Service Offers Support for BPOS Migration, Granular eDiscovery and Long-Term Email Archiving and a 100% Service Availability SLA

Mimecast®, a leading supplier of cloud-based email security, continuity, policy control and archiving, has today announced support for Microsoft Business Productivity Online Standard Suite (BPOS), easing migration headaches and extending the business benefits of Microsoft’s latest messaging and collaboration tools.

Mimecast’s services fully integrate with Microsoft’s hosted email platform, offering 100% service availability SLA and building on the benefits of BPOS by offering powerful email archiving, as well as granular eDiscovery and legal hold capabilities. BPOS is Microsoft’s first email solution delivered entirely through a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model, designed to give businesses a viable alternative to managing their email system in-house. This SaaS model aligns perfectly with Mimecast’s cloud-based services, already available for Microsoft’s on-premise solution, Exchange 2010.

“Momentum is building behind BPOS as businesses look to move applications to the cloud and run leaner IT departments,” commented Peter Bauer, co-founder and CEO of Mimecast. “But the shift to a fully hosted email environment is a big jump, both culturally and technically, and IT teams are going to need to be sure they can migrate their data safely.

“It’s also important for organizations considering moving to BPOS to realize that there are choices available to them in terms of how they migrate, and in terms of specific areas of functionality where the standard BPOS offering can be enhanced. As a true SaaS vendor, Mimecast has seven years of experience in delivering services through the cloud, so we are particularly excited by the prospect of BPOS gaining traction in the market.”

Laura DuBois, Program Vice President, IDC Storage Software and Solutions at IDC, said; “As we move into 2011, we see demand for third party cloud suppliers to offer services to complement the standard Microsoft BPOS functionality. With archiving, in particular, businesses for whom eDiscovery is critical will want more powerful search tools for their users and more flexibility and control over how long they archive data. We would expect these companies to look to augment BPOS with third party solutions such as Mimecast, which already has a strong track record of providing this level of functionality for on-premise and hosted Exchange.”

Benefits of the new Mimecast service for Microsoft BPOS include:

Eliminating risk during migration: For a business where email access is mission-critical even the shortest outage can be hugely damaging. Mimecast acts as a failsafe for users, providing a 100% availability SLA to keep businesses running at all times, through the migration and beyond Long-term independent email archive: Deployed in tandem with BPOS, Mimecast can provide an independent, long-term email archive offering bottomless and easily-searchable storage. Mimecast’s system stores all emails, including those deleted by users, for up to 10 years Advanced eDiscovery capabilities: The solution also offers granular eDiscovery and legal hold capability to help organizations meet their growing legal and compliance requirements. Mimecast’s archiving capability, combined with the system’s Outlook-integrated search tools, allows designated personnel to rapidly identify and retrieve evidential quality data in compliance with the legal restrictions

About Mimecast

Mimecast (www.mimecast.com) delivers SaaS-based enterprise email management including archiving, discovery, continuity, security and policy. By unifying disparate and fragmented email environments into one holistic solution that is always available from the cloud, Mimecast minimizes risk and reduces cost and complexity, while providing total end-to-end control of email. Founded in the United Kingdom in 2003, Mimecast serves more than 3,500 customers worldwide and has offices in Europe, North America, Africa, the Middle East and the Channel Islands.

Fama PR for MimecastTim Morin, 617-758-4158Mimecast@famapr.com

entry.headline: Pollo Campero and Fresh A-Peel Open in Downtown Disney®Marketplace
entry.body:
Pollo Campero and Fresh A-Peel Open in Downtown Disney® Marketplace

Latin chicken sensation launches first Orlando location, while innovative new restaurant concept unveils menu of nutritious, delicious foods

Starting today, visitors to Downtown Disney® Marketplace will experience the amazing flavors of Pollo Campero, an international Latin chicken quick service restaurant, and the first-of-its-kind Fresh A-Peel, featuring made-to-order fresh selections.

At Pollo Campero, Walt Disney World® guests can savor combinations of freshly prepared Latin chicken, unique flavorful side dishes such as yuca fries and sweet plantains, and Latin drinks including horchata and tamarindo. Pollo Campero’s fried and grilled chicken is marinated, sending the distinctive Pollo Campero flavor all the way to the bone. Fried chicken is hand-breaded in seasoned flour and slowly pressure-cooked without trans-fats, resulting in a flavorful and juicy meal. Grilled chicken features the taste of lime and orange juices, red bell peppers, and a special blend of Latin herbs and spices.

“Today is a landmark day for Pollo Campero,” said Roberto Denegri, president and chief operating officer of Campero USA. “We’re thrilled to open our newest restaurant at Disney, the No. 1 family vacation destination in the world. Most importantly, we’re excited to introduce guests to the fantastic flavors of our legendary Latin chicken.”

Inspired by Disney’s commitment to offer its guests great-tasting more healthful options, award-winning restaurateur Larry Levy and Pollo Campero teamed up to create Fresh A-Peel. Operating in the same location as Pollo Campero, Fresh A-Peel features a nutritious and delicious array of hot-off-the-grill items and chef-prepared salads and wraps, as well as gluten-free cupcakes and bakery treats.

“Our menu relies on the freshest, most flavorful ingredients,” said Mr. Levy. “I wanted to create nutritious foods even my grandchildren would love. All of them have favorites on the Fresh A-Peel menu, whether they are picky eaters or adventurous tasters.”

The restaurant has a back-to-basics approach to serving family favorites that are prepared in a better-for-you way. Chef-prepared entrees including salads are made with locally grown produce and available in a bowl or as a wrap, and all-natural burgers are prepared to order and packed with flavor. Balanced kids meals are served with fresh fruit and healthy sides, while other delicious menu offerings are gluten-free, low-sodium and vegetarian.

“This single restaurant offers guests an incredible range of dining choices, all in one location,” said Adam Cummis, president of the joint venture. “Not only can guests order Pollo Campero’s legendary fried or grilled chicken and signature side dishes, but they can also indulge in Fresh A-Peel’s nutritious and delicious meals. By pairing these two concepts together, we’ve created a destination that offers something for every diner, and we’re changing the way people think about quick dining.”

About Pollo Campero

The world’s largest Latin chicken restaurant chain, Pollo Campero offers its customers “Flavor You Can’t Campero.” The company serves more than 85 million customers each year at more than 300 restaurants in 12 countries around the globe. This includes more than 50 locations already open in the United States, with additional stores slated for this year. For more information, visit www.campero.com.

About Walt Disney World

Walt Disney World Resort is a contiguous 40-square-mile, world-class entertainment and recreation center featuring four theme parks (Magic Kingdom, Epcot, Disney’s Hollywood Studios and Disney’s Animal Kingdom); two water adventure parks (Blizzard Beach and Typhoon Lagoon); 34 resort hotels (25 owned and operated by Walt Disney World, includes seven Disney Vacation Club resort properties); 81 holes of golf on five courses; two full-service spas; Disney’s Wedding Pavilion; Disney’s Wide World of Sports Complex; and Downtown Disney, an entertainment-shopping-dining complex encompassing the Marketplace and West Side. Walt Disney World Resort is also included in vacation packages of Disney Cruise Line. Located at Lake Buena Vista, Fla., 20 miles southwest of Orlando, Walt Disney World Resort opened Oct. 1, 1971 and is open daily, year-round.

MPR Source for Campero USAVeronica P. Thomison, 972-801-2555 x111214-893-3740 cellvthomison@mprsource.com

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Gunmen attack Exxon facility off Nigeria -source
entry.body:
LAGOS Nov 15 (Reuters) - Gunmen attacked an oil facility off the southern coast of Nigeria operated by U.S. energy firm Exxon Mobil (XOM.N) overnight but it was unclear whether there were any injuries or damage, a security source said on Monday.

The site was a deep offshore facility off the coast of Akwa Ibom, one of the states that make up the Niger Delta, home to Africa's biggest oil and gas industry, said the source, who declined to be named because investigations were continuing.

The attack would be the second of its kind in as many weeks off Akwa Ibom. Militants attacked a rig operated by exploration firm Afren (AFRE.L) in the region a week ago, kidnapping two Americans, two Frenchmen, two Indonesians and a Canadian.

That attack was claimed by the Movement for the Emancipation of the Niger Delta (MEND), the main militant group in the region, which has warned of further strikes against energy facilities. [ID:nLDE6AB0L5] [ID:nLDE6A708L] (For more Reuters Africa coverage and to have your say on the top issues, visit: af.reuters.com/ ) (Reporting by Nick Tattersall)

FILED UNDER:

entry.author: None
entry.headline: MACH`s ISR Solution Opens Up Roaming For Visafone`s Pre-Paid CDMA Customers
entry.body:
MACH’s ISR Solution Opens Up Roaming For Visafone’s Pre-Paid CDMA Customers

New CDMA Network Signing Extends MACH’s Leadership Position in the Pre-Paid Roaming Market

MACH, the leading provider of hub-based mobile communication solutions, today announced the successful launch of Visafone’s pre-paid roaming service for CDMA subscribers using MACH’s market leading Inter-Standard Roaming (ISR) Solution. Visafone, Nigeria’s fastest growing mobile network operator, will be able to provide more than three million mostly pre-paid customers with seamless access to international roaming on GSM networks and other wireless technologies. By signing up yet another network operator to its industry-leading solution, MACH has firmed up its leadership position in the pre-paid roaming market.

Network operators are striving to deliver seamless connectivity worldwide for both their pre-paid and post-paid subscribers. By doing so, they improve customer experience, reduce churn and increase roaming revenues. Traditional inter-standard roaming solutions provide seamless connectivity for post-paid subscribers only. MACH’s ISR managed service solution is unique in the industry as it is able to provide for both pre-paid and post-paid subscribers. It offers an efficient and value added approach for CDMA operators, unlocking new revenue opportunities, and providing service continuity for their customers whilst travelling.

“One of Visafone’s stated goals is to be the pre-eminent and most customer focused telecom operator in Nigeria. Part of the plan to achieve this is the emphasis on seamless and efficient services that will ensure the best clarity and the widest coverage,” said Mr. R. Balachandran, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer, Visafone. “By signing up to MACH’s ISR solution, we are one step closer to achieving this aim. We opted for MACH’s fully managed, outsourced solution as it provides for both pre-paid and post-paid subscribers, it is quick and easy to implement, and it has been adopted by major mobile operators around the world.”

“We are delighted to be able to support Visafone in its business aims, while at the same time building on our established momentum in the pre-paid outsourced inter-standard roaming

market,” said Tom Heeremans, Regional Vice President EMEA, MACH. “As Nigeria’s fastest growing operator, Visafone needs to be able to offer seamless roaming - with one device, one number and one bill – to its mostly pre-paid CDMA customers in a very short space of time. Our ISR solution is typically deployed in fewer than 12 weeks, and Visafone’s customers will have full access to all their usual services while roaming, regardless of whether they are on pre-paid or contract packages.”

MACH ISR is a fully hosted inter-standard roaming solution in which a single agreement provides full featured voice and data roaming in more than 200 countries with minimal capital investment and operational expenditure. Based on Accuris Networks’ inter-working platform for voice and SMS, and MACH’s own patented Mobile IP Proxy for seamless data roaming, it is delivered through a proven managed services infrastructure. It offers turnkey interoperability between wireless technologies, including CDMA, 1X/EVDO, GSM, GPRS/UMTS, Wi-Fi, WiMAX and, soon, LTE. The solution, which can be implemented using existing connections, offers end users all of the services that are available on their home network, even when they are travelling. With end-to-end, one number interoperability, mobile operators can provide complete voice and messaging services without the time and investment required to build their own platform.

About MACH

MACH operates the world’s leading hub-based mobile communications exchange, uniting the global telecommunications marketplace. MACH provides a platform for the efficient exchange of mobile traffic, service validation, delivery, billing information, and settlement transactions. MACH is the largest provider of data and financial clearing solutions for wireless roaming and operates the world’s largest open connectivity roaming hub, Link2One. Headquartered in Luxembourg, MACH has offices in 12 countries and employs more than 1,000 people worldwide. MACH serves more than 650 mobile network operator customers, including Orange, Telefonica, T-Mobile, Vodafone, Verizon Wireless and Microsoft, as well as enterprise messaging customers like KLM. For further information, visit www.mach.com.

MACHEileen Preston, Global PR ManagerEipr@mach.com+44 0207 959 8119orVisafoneClifford Onyeike, Head Marketing and StrategyClifford.onyeike@visafone.com.ng+234 7025001101

entry.headline: REG-JP Morgan Chase J.P. Morgan Launches iPad Research App
entry.body:
J.P. Morgan Launches iPad Research App

App offers unparalleled flexibility and access to content on and offline

J.P. Morgan today unveiled a new iPad app, giving clients instant access to the Investment Bank’s award-winning research from the convenience of their iPad. The J.P. Morgan Research iPad app provides clients with reports and analysis from more than 1,000 analysts on economic indicators, markets, companies and asset classes around the world. Unlike other research apps in its class, users will be able to access content offline and receive instant alerts when new content they pre select becomes available.

“This innovative new app delivers our global franchise on an exciting new platform,” said Nick O’Donohoe, Global Head of Research at J.P. Morgan. “In this fast paced environment, we are committed to ensuring our clients can access ideas and information − even when on the go.”

The J.P. Morgan Research iPad app uniquely offers:

Customizable views of research across all asset classes Offline access to any previously read research Instant notification of new research that is of interest to the user The ability to open research in preferred document readers and to email content directly from the app Briefcase functionality to permanently store content offline

“The breadth of content and functionality offered by this application is unequalled in the market,” said Peter Cherasia, head of Markets Strategies for J.P. Morgan, whose technology team developed the app. “We will continue to leverage technology to help our clients gain real-time access to the resources they need to navigate complex markets and formulate effective trading strategies.”

Subscribers of J.P. Morgan research can download the J.P. Morgan Research app for free via the App store at itms://itunes.apple.com/us/app/j-p-morgan-research/id398983648?mt=8. To view a demo, go to www.jpmorgan.com/mm_ipad_demo.

For more information on additional J.P. Morgan apps available for download, please visit www.jpmorgan.com/mobile.

About J.P. Morgan

J.P. Morgan is the investment banking arm of JPMorgan Chase Co. (NYSE: JPM), a leading global financial services firm with assets of $2.1 trillion and operations in more than 60 countries. JPMorgan Chase is a leader in investment banking, financial services for consumers, small business and commercial banking, financial transaction processing, asset management and private equity. The firm serves millions of consumers in the United States and many of the world's most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under its J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Information about J.P. Morgan is available at www.jpmorgan.com.

J.P. MorganLauren Francis, 212-270-4435lauren.m.francis@jpmorgan.com

JP Morgan Chase

entry.author: None
entry.headline: J.P. Morgan lanza aplicación de investigación para iPad
entry.body:
J.P. Morgan lanza aplicación de investigación para iPad

Ofrece flexibilidad y acceso inigualable a contenido con y sin conexión a Internet

J.P. Morgan dio a conocer hoy una nueva aplicación para iPad, que ofrece a sus clientes acceso instantáneo a los trabajos de investigación galardonados del Banco de inversiones, desde la comodidad del iPad. La aplicación de investigación para iPad de J.P. Morgan brinda a los clientes acceso a los informes y trabajos de análisis de más de 1.000 analistas, que examinan los indicadores económicos, mercados, compañías y tipos de activos en todo el mundo. A diferencia de otras aplicaciones de investigación de este tipo, los usuarios podrán acceder al contenido sin estar conectados a Internet, y recibir alertas instantáneas cuando se publique contenido nuevo que hayan seleccionado como de interés.

“Esta es una aplicación muy novedosa, que facilita el acceso a nuestra franquicia global desde una plataforma nueva y atractiva”, explicó Nick O’Donohoe, jefe global de investigación de J.P. Morgan. “Vivimos en un entorno acelerado, y por eso nos hemos comprometido con nuestros clientes, y les garantizamos que pueden acceder a las nuevas ideas y a la información, incluso cuando se están desplazando de un lugar al otro”.

La aplicación exclusiva de investigación para iPad de J.P. Morgan ofrece:

Vistas personalizables de investigación a lo largo de una amplia gama de activos Acceso sin conexión a Internet a todos los trabajos de investigación que se haya consultado con anterioridad Notificación instantánea sobre los nuevos trabajos de investigación que entran dentro del área de interés del usuario La posibilidad de abrir el trabajo de investigación en el formato de lectura que elija el usuario, y enviarlo por correo electrónico directamente desde la aplicación Función de almacenamiento para guardar el contenido de forma permanente sin conexión a Internet

“Esta aplicación cubre una amplísima gama de contenidos, y ofrece funciones exclusivas, únicas en el mercado”, señaló Peter Cherasia, jefe de estrategias de mercado de J.P. Morgan, cuyo equipo de tecnología desarrolló la aplicación. “Seguiremos optimizando esta tecnología para ayudar a nuestros clientes a acceder en tiempo real a los recursos que necesitan para comprender los mercados complejos y desarrollar estrategias efectivas de operación”.

Los abonados al servicio de investigación de J.P. Morgan pueden descargar la aplicación gratuitamente desde la tienda Web en itms://itunes.apple.com/us/app/j-p-morgan-research/id398983648?mt=8. Para ver una demostración, visite www.jpmorgan.com/mm_ipad_demo.

Para más información sobre otras aplicaciones de J.P. Morgan que se pueden descargar para dispositivos móviles, visite www.jpmorgan.com/mobile.

Acerca de J.P. Morgan

J.P. Morgan es el brazo bancario de inversiones de JPMorgan Chase Co. (NYSE: JPM), una firma mundial líder en servicios financieros con activos por US$2,1 billones y operaciones en más de 60 países. JPMorgan Chase es líder en banca de inversión, servicios financieros para consumidores, banca comercial y de pequeñas empresas, procesamiento de transacciones financieras, gestión de activos y capital privado. La firma atiende a millones de consumidores en Estados Unidos y muchos de los clientes corporativos, institucionales y gubernamentales más importantes del mundo bajo las marcas de J.P. Morgan y Chase. Encuentre más información acerca de J.P. Morgan en www.jpmorgan.com.

El texto original en el idioma fuente de este comunicado es la versión oficial autorizada. Las traducciones solo se suministran como adaptación y deben cotejarse con el texto en el idioma fuente, que es la única versión del texto que tendrá un efecto legal.

J.P. MorganLauren Francis, 212-270-4435lauren.m.francis@jpmorgan.com

entry.author: None
entry.headline: J.P. Morgan Lança Aplicativo para Pesquisa para iPad
entry.body:
J.P. Morgan Lança Aplicativo para Pesquisa para iPad

Aplicativo oferece flexibilidade inédita e acesso a conteúdo on-line e off-line

A J.P. Morgan divulgou hoje um novo aplicativo para iPad, fornecendo aos clientes acesso imediato à premiada pesquisa do Banco de Investimentos a partir do conforto de seus iPads. O aplicativo para Pesquisa para iPad da J.P. Morgan fornece aos clientes relatórios e análises de mais de 1.000 analistas sobre indicadores econômicos, mercados, empresas e classes de ativos no mundo todo. Diferente de outros aplicativos de pesquisa em sua classe, os usuários poderão acessar conteúdo off-line e receber alertas instantâneos quando o novo conteúdo que eles pré-selecionaram estiver disponível.

“Este novo aplicativo inovador entrega nossa franquia global em uma nova plataforma estimulante”, disse Nick O’Donohoe, Diretor Global de Pesquisa do J.P. Morgan. “Neste ambiente de ritmo rápido, estamos comprometidos em garantir que nossos clientes possam acessar idéias e informações - mesmo quando estiverem se deslocando”.

O aplicativo para Pesquisa para iPad da J.P. Morgan oferece:

Visualizações personalizáveis de pesquisa em todas as classes de ativos Acesso off-line a qualquer pesquisa lida anteriormente Notificação instantânea sobre nova pesquisa de interesse do usuário A capacidade para abrir a pesquisa em leitores de documentos preferidos e para enviar conteúdo por e-mail diretamente do aplicativo Funcionalidade do Briefcase para armazenar permanentemente conteúdo off-line

“A extensão do conteúdo e funcionalidade oferecidas por este aplicativo são inéditas no mercado", disse Peter Cherasia, Diretor de Estratégias de Mercados do J.P. Morgan, cuja equipe de tecnologia desenvolveu o aplicativo. "Nós continuaremos a alavancar a tecnologia para ajudar nossos clientes a obter acesso em tempo real aos recursos que precisam para navegar em mercados complexos e formular estratégias de negociação eficazes”.

Os assinantes da pesquisa do J.P. Morgan podem fazer o download do aplicativo para Pesquisa J.P. Morgan grátis através da loja App em itms://itunes.apple.com/us/app/j-p-morgan-research/id398983648?mt=8. Para ver um demo, acesse www.jpmorgan.com/mm_ipad_demo.

Para obter outras informações sobre outros aplicativos J.P. Morgan para download, visite www.jpmorgan.com/mobile.

Sobre o J.P. Morgan

J.P. Morgan é o braço de banco de investimentos da JPMorgan Chase Co. (NYSE: JPM), uma firma de serviços financeiros global líder com ativos de US$2,1 trilhões e operações em mais de 60 países. A JPMorgan Chase é líder em serviços de bancos de investimentos, serviços financeiros para consumidores, pequenas empresas e bancos comerciais, processamento de transações financeiras, gerenciamento de ativos e private equity. A firma atende milhões de consumidores nos Estados Unidos e diversos dos mais proeminentes clientes corporativos, institucionais e governamentais do mundo sob suas marcas J.P. Morgan e Chase. Informações sobre o J.P. Morgan estão disponíveis em www.jpmorgan.com.

J.P. MorganLauren Francis, 212-270-4435lauren.m.francis@jpmorgan.com

entry.headline: J.P. Morgan lancia un'app di ricerca per l'iPad
entry.body:
J.P. Morgan lancia un'app di ricerca per l'iPad

Un'applicazione che offre una flessibilità ineguagliabile e l'accesso a contenuti in linea e non in linea

J.P. Morgan ha svelato oggi una nuova app per iPad che offre ai clienti l'accesso istantaneo alla premiata ricerca della banca di investimento con la comodità del proprio iPad. L'applicazione di ricerca per iPad della J.P. Morgan fornisce ai clienti report e analisi di oltre 1.000 analisti su indicatori economici, mercati, società e classi di asset in tutto il mondo. Diversamente da altre applicazioni di ricerca di questo tipo, gli utenti potranno accedere ai contenuti non in linea e ricevere avvisi istantanei nel momento in cui nuovi contenuti precedentemente selezionati diventino disponibili.

"Questa nuova applicazione innovativa tiene fede alla promessa di una nuova piattaforma entusiasmante per il nostro franchise globale", ha dichiarato Nick O’Donohoe, responsabile globale della ricerca presso J.P. Morgan. "In questo ambiente caratterizzato da ritmi frenetici, siamo impegnati a garantire che i nostri clienti possano avere accesso a idee e informazioni, anche quando in movimento".

L'applicazione di ricerca per iPad della J.P. Morgan presenta l'offerta esclusiva di:

schermi personalizzabili di ricerca in tutte le classi di asset; l'accesso non in linea a qualunque ricerca già letta in precedenza; avvisi istantanei di nuove ricerche rientranti nella sfera di interesse dell'utente; la possibilità di aprire ricerche in lettori di documenti preferiti e inviare i contenuti via email direttamente dall'applicazione; una funzione di cartella per il salvataggio permanente di contenuti non in linea.

"L'ampiezza dei contenuti e delle funzioni offerte da questa applicazione è ineguagliata sul mercato", ha affermato Peter Cherasia, responsabile delle strategie di mercato della J.P. Morgan, il cui team tecnologie ha sviluppato l'applicazione. "Continueremo a sfruttare la tecnologia per aiutare i nostri clienti a ottenere accesso in tempo reale alle risorse di cui necessitano per navigare mercati complicati e formulare strategie commerciali efficaci".

Gli abbonati alla ricerca J.P. Morgan possono scaricare gratuitamente l'applicazione di ricerca dall'App store all'indirizzo itms://itunes.apple.com/us/app/j-p-morgan-research/id398983648?mt=8. Per visualizzare un demo andare su www.jpmorgan.com/mm_ipad_demo.

Per maggiori informazioni su applicazioni J.P. Morgan disponibili per il download, consultare il sito www.jpmorgan.com/mobile.

Informazioni su J.P. Morgan

J.P. Morgan è il ramo dedicato all'investment banking della JPMorgan Chase Co. (NYSE: JPM), una delle maggiori aziende di servizi finanziari a livello internazionale con un attivo di 2,1 trilioni di dollari e attività in oltre 60 paesi. JPMorgan Chase è leader in: investment banking, servizi finanziari per i consumatori, commercial banking, banking per le piccole imprese, elaborazione delle transazioni finanziarie, gestione dei beni e private equity. L'azienda serve milioni di consumatori negli Stati Uniti e molti fra i più prestigiosi clienti internazionali nei settori corporate, istituzionale e governativo con i suoi marchi J.P. Morgan e Chase. Ulteriori informazioni su J.P. Morgan sono disponibili all'indirizzo www.jpmorgan.com.

Il testo originale del presente annuncio, redatto nella lingua di partenza, è la versione ufficiale che fa fede. Le traduzioni sono offerte unicamente per comodità del lettore e devono rinviare al testo in lingua originale, che è l'unico giuridicamente valido.

J.P. MorganLauren Francis, 212-270-4435lauren.m.francis@jpmorgan.com

entry.headline: J.P. Morgan bringt Research-App für das iPad heraus
entry.body:
J.P. Morgan bringt Research-App für das iPad heraus

App bietet beispiellose Flexibilität und Zugang zu Online- und Offline-Inhalten

J.P. Morgan stellte heute ein neues App vor, mit dem seine Kunden über ihr iPad bequem auf die preisgekrönten Analysen der Investmentbank zugreifen können. Das J.P. Morgan Research-App für das iPad bietet den Nutzern Berichte und Analysen zu Wirtschaftsindikatoren, Märkten, Unternehmen und neuen Anlageklassen aus der ganzen Welt von mehr als 1000 Analysten. Im Gegensatz zu anderen Research-Apps seiner Klasse ist es in der Lage, auch offline auf Informationen zuzugreifen und den Nutzer sofort zu benachrichtigen, wenn neue Inhalte in zuvor ausgewählten Kategorien erhältlich sind.

„Dieses innovative neue App stellt unser globales Angebot auf einer interessanten neuen Plattform zur Verfügung“, sagte Nick O'Donohoe, Global Head of Research von J.P. Morgan. „In diesem tempointensiven Umfeld wollen wir sicherstellen, dass unsere Kunden Zugriff auf Ideen und Informationen haben - auch unterwegs.“

Der einzigartige Funktionsumfang des J.P. Morgan Research-App für das iPad beinhaltet:

Anpassbare Ansichten von Analysen über alle Anlageklassen hinweg Offline-Zugriff auf alle zuvor gelesenen Berichte Sofortige Benachrichtigung, wenn neue Inhalte bereit stehen, die den Nutzer interessieren Die Fähigkeit, Berichte in den bevorzugten Dokumentenlesern zu öffnen und Inhalte direkt über das App per E-Mail zu verschicken Eine Aktenkoffer-Funktion, um Inhalte permanent offline zu speichern

„Die breite Auswahl von Inhalten und der Funktionsumfang dieser Anwendung sind auf dem Markt ohnegleichen“, sagte Peter Cherasia, Head of Markets Strategies von J.P. Morgan und der Leiter des Teams, welches das App entwickelt hat. „Wir werden weiterhin moderne Technologie nutzen, um unseren Kunden Echtzeitzugang zu den Ressourcen zu bieten, die sie brauchen, um sich in komplexen Märkten zurechtzufinden und effektive Handelsstrategien auszuarbeiten.“

Abonnenten von J.P. Morgan Research können das J.P. Morgan Research-App kostenlos vom App-Store unter itms://itunes.apple.com/us/app/j-p-morgan-research/id398983648?mt=8 herunterladen. Ein Demo-Video finden Sie unter www.jpmorgan.com/mm_ipad_demo.

Für weitere Informationen über zusätzliche Apps von J. P. Morgan, die zum Download bereitstehen, besuchen Sie bitte www.jpmorgan.com/mobile.

Über J.P. Morgan

J.P. Morgan ist die Investment-Banking-Sparte von JPMorgan Chase Co. (NYSE: JPM), eine führende globale Finanzdienstleistungsgesellschaft mit einem Vermögen von 2,1 Billionen US-Dollar und Geschäftstätigkeiten in über 60 Ländern. JPMorgan Chase ist ein Branchenführer im Investment Banking, Finanzdienstleistungen für Verbraucher und kleinere Unternehmen, Handelsbankwesen, in der Abwicklung von Finanztransaktionen, der Vermögensverwaltung und im Private-Equity-Geschäft. Unter ihren Marken J.P. Morgan und Chase dient die Gesellschaft dient Millionen von Kunden in den USA sowie vielen der berühmtesten Konzerne, Institutionen und staatlichen Stellen der Welt. Informationen über J.P. Morgan finden Sie unter www.jpmorgan.com.

entry.headline: J.P. Morgan lance l`application Research pour iPad
entry.body:
J.P. Morgan lance l’application Research pour iPad

L’application offre une flexibilité sans équivalent et un accès au contenu en ligne et hors ligne

J.P. Morgan a dévoilé aujourd’hui une nouvelle application pour iPad, offrant à ses clients un accès instantané très pratique depuis leur iPad aux recherches primées de la banque d’investissement. L’application Research pour iPad de J.P. Morgan fournit aux clients des rapports et analyses provenant de plus de 1000 analystes spécialisés dans les indicateurs économiques, les marchés, les sociétés et les classes d’actifs à travers le monde. À la différence des autres applications de recherche de sa catégorie, elle permettra aux utilisateurs d’accéder à du contenu hors ligne et de recevoir des alertes instantanées lorsque du nouveau contenu qu’ils auront présélectionné deviendra disponible.

« Cette nouvelle application novatrice met à disposition notre franchise mondiale sur une nouvelle plate-forme passionnante », a déclaré Nick O’Donohoe, chef mondial de la recherche chez J.P. Morgan. « Dans cet environnement très dynamique, nous nous engageons à garantir à nos clients un accès aux idées et aux informations - même lorsqu'ils sont en déplacement ».

L’application Research pour iPad de J.P. Morgan offre de manière unique :

Des vues personnalisables sur les recherches à travers toutes les classes d’actifs Un accès hors ligne à toute recherche lue précédemment Une notification instantanée des nouvelles recherches qui présentent un intérêt pour l’utilisateur La capacité d’ouvrir une recherche dans les lecteurs de documents préférés et d’envoyer le contenu par courriel directement depuis l’application La fonctionnalité porte-documents afin de stocker de manière permanente du contenu hors ligne

« L’ampleur du contenu et les fonctionnalités offertes par cette application n’ont pas d’équivalent sur le marché », a déclaré Peter Cherasia, responsable des stratégies de marché chez J.P. Morgan, dont l’équipe technologique a développé l’application. « Nous continuerons de tirer profit de la technologie pour aider nos clients à accéder en temps réel aux ressources dont ils ont besoin afin de naviguer à travers des marchés complexes et de formuler des stratégies de négociation efficaces ».

Les abonnés aux recherches de J.P. Morgan peuvent télécharger l’application Research de J.P. Morgan gratuitement via l’App store sur itms://itunes.apple.com/us/app/j-p-morgan-research/id398983648?mt=8. Pour visualiser une démonstration, rendez-vous sur le site www.jpmorgan.com/mm_ipad_demo.

Pour davantage d’informations sur les autres applications de J.P. Morgan disponibles en téléchargement, veuillez consulter www.jpmorgan.com/mobile.

À propos de J.P. Morgan

J.P. Morgan est l'organe de banque d'investissement de JPMorgan Chase Co.(NYSE : JPM), un fournisseur de services financiers de premier plan mondial détenant des actifs évalués à 2,1 billions de dollars et implanté dans plus de 60 pays. JPMorgan Chase est un chef de file dans le domaine de la banque d'investissement, des services financiers destinés aux particuliers et aux petites entreprises, et de la banque commerciale, de l'exécution de transactions financières, de la gestion d'actif et du capital d'investissement. La société sert des millions de consommateurs aux États-Unis et bon nombre des plus importantes entreprises, institutions et entités gouvernementales au monde sous la bannière de ses marques, J.P. Morgan et Chase. Pour de plus amples informations à propos de J.P. Morgan, consultez le site www.jpmorgan.com.

entry.headline: J.P. Morgan lanceert iPad Research toepassing
entry.body:
J.P. Morgan lanceert iPad Research toepassing

Toepassing biedt ongeëvenaarde flexibiliteit en toegang tot on- en offline inhoud

J.P. Morgan heeft vandaag een nieuwe iPad toepassing onthuld, waarbij klanten onmiddellijk toegang wordt verleend tot het met een prijs onderscheiden onderzoek van de Investment Bank vanuit het comfort van hun iPad. De J.P. Morgan Research iPad toepassing verleent klanten inzicht in rapporten en analyses van meer dan 1.000 analisten over economische indicators, bedrijven en vermogensklassen wereldwijd. Anders dan andere onderzoekstoepassingen in deze soort, kunnen gebruikers toegang krijgen tot offline inhoud en onmiddellijk bericht ontvangen bij het beschikbaar komen van de door hen vooraf geselecteerde nieuwe inhoud.

“Deze innovatieve en moderne toepassing brengt onze licentie wereldwijd op een opwindend nieuw platform,” zei Nick O’Donohoe, Global Head of Research bij J.P. Morgan. “In deze met snelle pas vooruitgaande omgeving, gaan wij de verbintenis aan om onze klanten de garantie te bieden dat zij toegang tot ideeën en informatie hebben − zelfs als zij zich niet thuis bevinden.”

De toepassing van J.P. Morgan Research iPad biedt als enige:

Klantvriendelijke weergaves van onderzoek in alle kapitaalklassen Offline toegang tot ieder eerder gelezen onderzoek Onmiddellijke kennisgeving van nieuw onderzoek dat van belang is voor de gebruiker De mogelijkheid voor open onderzoek met behulp van lezers van voorkeursdocumenten en toegang tot de inhoud van e-mails direct vanuit de toepassing Briefcase-functionaliteit voor het permanenten opslaan van inhoud offline

“De reikwijdte van de inhoud en functionaliteit die deze toepassing biedt is ongeëvenaard op de markt,” zei Peter Cherasia, hoofd van marktstrategieën voor J.P. Morgan, en wiens technologisch team de toepassing ontwikkelde. “Wij zullen doorgaan met het leveren van een hefboomeffect van de technologie om onze klanten te helpen real-time toegang te krijgen tot de hulpmiddelen die zij nodig hebben om complexe markten te navigeren en doeltreffende handelstrategieën te formuleren.”

Abonnees van J.P. Morgan research kunnen de J.P. Morgan Research toepassing gratis downloaden via de App store op itms://itunes.apple.com/us/app/j-p-morgan-research/id398983648?mt=8. Voor het zien van een demo, ga naar www.jpmorgan.com/mm_ipad_demo.

Voor meer informatie over het downloaden van extra beschikbare toepassingen van J.P. Morgan, ga svp naar www.jpmorgan.com/mobile.

J.P. Morgan

J.P. Morgan is het bedrijf voor beleggingsbankieren bij JPMorgan Chase Co. (NYSE: JPM), een toonaangevende multinational voor financiële dienstverlening met een vermogen van $ 2,1 biljoen en activiteiten in meer dan 60 landen. JPMorgan Chase is een van de grootste bedrijven in beleggingsbankieren, financiële diensten voor particulieren, bankieren voor kleine bedrijven en de handel, verwerking van financiële transacties, vermogensbeheer en private equity. Het bedrijf levert diensten aan miljoenen consumenten in de Verenigde Staten en heel wat van de meest prominente bedrijven, institutionele beleggers en regeringen overal ter wereld, met de naam J.P. Morgan en Chase. Informatie over J.P. Morgan vindt u bij www.jpmorgan.com.

Deze bekendmaking is officieel geldend in de originele brontaal. Vertalingen zijn slechts als leeshulp bedoeld en moeten worden vergeleken met de tekst in de brontaal welke als enige juridische geldigheid beoogt.

J.P. MorganLauren Francis, 212-270-4435lauren.m.francis@jpmorgan.com

entry.headline: J.P. Morgan Launches iPad Research App
entry.body:
J.P. Morgan Launches iPad Research App

App offers unparalleled flexibility and access to content on and offline

J.P. Morgan today unveiled a new iPad app, giving clients instant access to the Investment Bank’s award-winning research from the convenience of their iPad. The J.P. Morgan Research iPad app provides clients with reports and analysis from more than 1,000 analysts on economic indicators, markets, companies and asset classes around the world. Unlike other research apps in its class, users will be able to access content offline and receive instant alerts when new content they pre select becomes available.

“This innovative new app delivers our global franchise on an exciting new platform,” said Nick O’Donohoe, Global Head of Research at J.P. Morgan. “In this fast paced environment, we are committed to ensuring our clients can access ideas and information − even when on the go.”

The J.P. Morgan Research iPad app uniquely offers:

Customizable views of research across all asset classes Offline access to any previously read research Instant notification of new research that is of interest to the user The ability to open research in preferred document readers and to email content directly from the app Briefcase functionality to permanently store content offline

“The breadth of content and functionality offered by this application is unequalled in the market,” said Peter Cherasia, head of Markets Strategies for J.P. Morgan, whose technology team developed the app. “We will continue to leverage technology to help our clients gain real-time access to the resources they need to navigate complex markets and formulate effective trading strategies.”

Subscribers of J.P. Morgan research can download the J.P. Morgan Research app for free via the App store at itms://itunes.apple.com/us/app/j-p-morgan-research/id398983648?mt=8. To view a demo, go to www.jpmorgan.com/mm_ipad_demo.

For more information on additional J.P. Morgan apps available for download, please visit www.jpmorgan.com/mobile.

About J.P. Morgan

J.P. Morgan is the investment banking arm of JPMorgan Chase Co. (NYSE: JPM), a leading global financial services firm with assets of $2.1 trillion and operations in more than 60 countries. JPMorgan Chase is a leader in investment banking, financial services for consumers, small business and commercial banking, financial transaction processing, asset management and private equity. The firm serves millions of consumers in the United States and many of the world's most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under its J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Information about J.P. Morgan is available at www.jpmorgan.com.

J.P. MorganLauren Francis, 212-270-4435lauren.m.francis@jpmorgan.com

entry.author: None
entry.headline: UPDATE 1-Shareholder sues Atlas to stop Chevron deal
entry.body:
* Shareholder seeks to block sale to Chevron

* Sale comes a low point in gas prices (Adds Chevron statement in paragraph seven)

By Tom Hals

WILMINGTON, Del, Nov 16 (Reuters) - A shareholder filed a lawsuit to block the proposed acquisition of Atlas Energy Inc ATLS.O by Chevron Corp (CVX.N), alleging the $3.2 billion deal was "intrinsically unfair" to shareholders.

The acquisition of Atlas gives Chevron access to the Marcellus shale field in Pennsylvania and neighboring states, which is one of the largest U.S. natural gas finds in decades.

Chevron bid $43.34 per share, a 37 percent premium to Atlas's closing price prior to the deal's announcement on Nov. 9.

The lawsuit, which seeks class action status, was brought on Monday by shareholder Abraham Katsman. The suit accuses Atlas's board of directors of breaching their fiduciary duties, aided by Atlas and Chevron, for agreeing to sell the company cheaply.

"The timing of the proposed sale of Atlas to Chevron appears opportunistically timed to take advantage of the current economic downturn, and is grossly unfair, inadequate, and substantially below the fair or inherent value of the company," said the complaint, which was filed in Delaware's Chancery Court.

Moon Township, Pennsylvania-based Atlas is incorporated in Delaware.

"Chevron believes it has made a fair offer for Atlas. We believe this suit is without merit," said a statement from Chevron.

Atlas did not immediately return a call for comment.

The sale of the company comes as U.S. natural gas prices have tumbled, largely because of rising output from the Marcellus and other shale fields.

Atlas shares slipped 4.5 cents to $43.96 in Nasdaq trading on Tuesday, while Chevron shares fell $1.66 to $82.48 on the New York Stock Exchange.

The case is Abraham Katsman v Atlas Energy Inc et al, Delaware Chancery Court, No. 5990.

The prior case is In re Atlas Energy Resources LLC unitholder litigation, Delaware Court of Chancery, No. 4589. (Additional reporting by Braden Reddall in San Francisco)

entry.headline: Shareholder sues Atlas to stop Chevron deal
entry.body:
* Shareholder seeks to block sale to Chevron

* Sale comes a low point in gas prices

By Tom Hals

WILMINGTON, Del, Nov 16 (Reuters) - A shareholder filed a class action lawsuit to block the proposed acquisition of Atlas Energy Inc ATLS.O by Chevron Corp (CVX.N), alleging the $3.2 billion deal was "intrinsically unfair" to shareholders.

The acquisition of Atlas gives Chevron access to the Marcellus shale field in Pennsylvania and neighboring states, which is one of the largest U.S. natural gas finds in decades.

Chevron bid $43.34 per share, a 37 percent premium to Atlas's closing price prior to the deal's announcement on Nov. 9.

The lawsuit, brought on Monday by shareholder Abraham Katsman, accuses Atlas's board of directors of breaching their fiduciary duties, aided by Atlas and Chevron, for agreeing to sell the company cheaply.

"The timing of the proposed sale of Atlas to Chevron appears opportunistically timed to take advantage of the current economic downturn, and is grossly unfair, inadequate, and substantially below the fair or inherent value of the company," said the complaint, which was filed in Delaware's Chancery Court.

Moon Township, Pennsylvania-based Atlas is incorporated in Delaware.

Atlas and Chevron did not immediately return calls for comment.

The sale of the company comes as U.S. natural gas prices have tumbled, largely because of rising output from the Marcellus and other shale fields.

Atlas is already facing a similar lawsuit as a result of a deal by the company to acquire a limited liability company subsidiary for what unitholders of the subsidiary argue is an undervalued price.

Atlas shares slipped 4.5 cents to $43.96 in Nasdaq trading on Tuesday, while Chevron shares fell about 2 percent to $82.48.

A Delaware judge cleared that case to proceed last month.

The latest case is Abraham Katsman v Atlas Energy Inc et al, Delaware Chancery Court, No. 5990.

The prior case is In re Atlas Energy Resources LLC unitholder litigation, Delaware Court of Chancery, No. 4589. (Additional reporting by Braden Reddall in San Francisco; editing by Andre Grenon)

entry.headline: Ron Sachs Communications Named Top Florida PR Firm in O`Dwyer`s 2010 Rankings of High-Tech & Technology
entry.body:
Ron Sachs Communications Named Top Florida PR Firm in O’Dwyer’s 2010 Rankings of High-Tech Technology

Ron Sachs Communications, a Tallahassee-based integrated communications firm, today announced it has been named Florida’s top rated high-tech public relations firm by O’Dwyer’s – number one in Florida and 47th nationally.

“As Florida’s economy continues to diversify and expand, our firm is proud to play a leading role to help Florida’s high-tech and technology stakeholders broaden their reach and refine their message,” said Ron Sachs, president of Ron Sachs Communications. “Developing sustainable, high-tech industries is the key to Florida’s future economic growth. Our firm looks forward to continuing our role as Florida’s premier firm, providing our clients with a strategic advantage through smart and cutting-edge media and public affairs solutions.”

O’Dwyer’s is a public relations news publication spotlighting PR excellence. The November high-tech issue showcases high-tech PR as a growing and vibrant sector of the industry and acknowledges firms who successfully give visibility to technological developments and earn media coverage for their clients. The other Florida firms in the O’Dwyer’s ranking are Moore Consulting Group at 57, TransMedia Group at 67 and Boardroom Communications at 71.

Supported by an Emmy Award-winning video production team, an Addy Award-winning graphics design group and a rapidly growing social media team, the firm provides communications services to high-tech clients including software, social media, research and technology services companies. Additionally, Ron Sachs Communications continues to utilize the most cutting-edge technology and strategies to reach audiences in new ways.

Ranked among the top firms in Florida and the top 100 nationally, Ron Sachs Communications is Florida's leading public affairs communications firm, building public and opinion leader support for issues of local, state and regional importance. Ron Sachs Communications is based in Tallahassee with offices in Central Florida.

Ron Sachs CommunicationsRyan Duffy, 850-222-1996

entry.headline: Microsoft's Gates, Ballmer defend stock sales
entry.body:
SEATTLE (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp Chairman Bill Gates and Chief Executive Steve Ballmer defended recent stock sales on Tuesday as they faced tough questions from shareholders frustrated by the lack of growth in the company's shares over the past decade.

Gates, who co-founded the company in 1975, sells 20 million shares every quarter to help fund his philanthropic activities, while Ballmer is planning to sell 75 million shares by year end for tax planning reasons.

"Both Bill and I retain very substantial interests in the company," said Ballmer, CEO since 2000, at the company's annual shareholders meeting, which was broadcast on the Web. "If you look at the amount of shares sold by insiders it's really a very small percentage of all of the shares that sell, it's not a material factor in the stock price."

More than 50 million Microsoft shares change hands most days on Nasdaq, sometimes more than 100 million. The company has about 8.6 billion shares outstanding.

Gates is still the largest individual shareholder with about 7.2 percent of the company, followed by Ballmer with about 4 percent. Gates regularly sells shares in batches of 1 million to 4 million to fund his $33 billion Bill Melinda Gates Foundation, which became his focus when he retired from day-to-day work at Microsoft in 2008.

Asked by a shareholder if he could somehow annul his Microsoft shares, rather than selling them, Gates defended his priorities.

"I made that decision that wealth was going to go to the Foundation and the causes of the Foundation as opposed to being some reduction in shares outstanding for Microsoft," said Gates, in his only public utterance at the meeting.

Microsoft shares fell about 1 percent to $25.81 on Nasdaq. The shares are down about 15 percent this year, compared to a 9 percent gain in the Nasdaq. They are trading around the same level as 2002.

(Reporting by Bill Rigby; Editing by Derek Caney)

entry.author: Maria Aspan
entry.headline: Telco payment venture targets Visa and MasterCard
entry.body:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - Three of the top four U.S. mobile service providers -- Verizon Wireless, ATT Inc (T.N) and T-Mobile USA -- are working together to build a network that would let consumers pay for goods with their phones.

Their Isis joint venture, which was formally announced on Tuesday, plans to take market share from dominant payment networks Visa Inc (V.N) and MasterCard Inc (MA.N), which currently process most U.S. credit and debit card payments. Sources told Reuters on Monday that an announcement was imminent.

Isis said the network would use Discover Financial Services' (DFS.N) national payment network at its roughly 7 million U.S. merchant partners and that Barclaycard U.S., a unit of Barclays Plc (BARC.L) is expected to be the first lender on the network to offer mobile payment products.

"We're a competitive alternative" to Visa and MasterCard, Isis CEO Michael Abbott told Reuters in an interview on Tuesday. Abbott, a former GE Capital credit cards executive, was named chief executive of the venture on Tuesday.

Major banks, mobile phone companies and card processing networks are vying to enter the emerging U.S. market for mobile payments, which some say could eventually replace credit and debit cards as a primary means of payment.

The idea behind mobile payments is for consumers to be able to wave their phone at a machine to pay for items such as train tickets, potentially eliminating the need to carry a wallet.

But while such services are popular in places such as Japan, they have been slow to take off in the United States. Only about 150,000 U.S. merchants accept contactless payments, which allow consumers to wave a credit card -- or a phone -- close to a payment terminal instead of swiping it through a machine.

WATCHING THE COMPETITION

After kicking off its service with just Discover and Barclays, Isis plans to become available to other merchants, banks and mobile operators, the company said.

The venture is a coup for Discover, the fourth-place U.S. processing network, which is trying to take market share after long lagging Visa, MasterCard and American Express Co (AXP.N).

"This is going to be a significant opportunity for us" to gain network volume, Discover payments services head Diane Offereins told Reuters in an interview. She would not provide more specifics about how much business Discover expects to gain from its participation in the venture.

Isis said the venture would introduce its product in certain areas in the next 18 months.

In the meantime, both Visa and MasterCard have been working with major U.S. banks to test their own versions of mobile payments. Visa, which has been testing smartphone payments with Bank of America Corp (BAC.N), JPMorgan Chase Co (JPM.N) and Wells Fargo Co (WFC.N), plans to make them more widely available to consumers by mid-2011.

Visa executives downplayed the possibility of increased competition from the mobile carriers on Tuesday. But "we're watching it," Visa President of the Americas William Sheedy told Reuters in an interview.

Isis said it will use a short-range wireless technology known as near-field communication (NFC), which enables an encrypted exchange of information between devices that are placed at a short distance to each other.

Consumers would need to upgrade their phone to a device that has an embedded NFC chip before they could use Isis.

Abbott would not name handset partners for the venture, but he has already had talks with "nearly everybody" and expects the technology eventually to be added to all phones.

He said the large customer base of the three carriers involved in the venture would be essential to its success.

Between them the operators have about 200 million customers, roughly half of which replace their phone in a given year, he said.

"There's a lot of science experiments out there that don't have the scale," he said, referring to the large customer base.

Abbott also said the company would add more banking partners to the venture.

"We fully anticipate we'll have a number of banking partners involved over the next several quarters," he said.

He refused to discuss the ownership structure of the venture or the amount of money each of its partners are investing.

Verizon Wireless is a venture of Verizon Communications Inc (VZ.N) and Vodafone Group Plc (VOD.L). T-Mobile USA is owned by Deutsche Telekom AG (DTEGn.DE).

(Additional reporting by Joe Rauch; editing by Maureen Bavdek and Andre Grenon)

* Venture to be headed by former GE executive Abbott

* Discover, Barclays are first partners

* Effort to compete with Visa, MasterCard

* Sees service launch in next 18 months (Rewrites throughout with comment from Isis, Discover, Visa interviews, background, bylines)

By Maria Aspan and Sinead Carew

"This is going to be a significant opportunity for us" to gain network volume, Discover payments services head Diane Offereins told Reuters in an interview. She would not provide more specifics about how much business Discover expects to gain from its participation in the venture.

Abbott also said the company would add more banking partners to the venture.

"We fully anticipate we'll have a number of banking partners involved over the next several quarters," he said.

He refused to discuss the ownership structure of the venture or the amount of money each of its partners are investing.

Verizon Wireless is a venture of Verizon Communications Inc (VZ.N) and Vodafone Group Plc (VOD.L). T-Mobile USA is owned by Deutsche Telekom AG (DTEGn.DE). (Additional reporting by Joe Rauch; editing by Maureen Bavdek and Andre Grenon)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Microsoft says sells 1 million Kinect devices
entry.body:
SEATTLE (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp said on Monday it has sold more than 1 million of its new hands-free Kinect gaming systems in the first 10 days since launch, putting it on track to beat its target of 5 million sales by the end of the year.

The world's largest software company is hoping the Kinect will help revitalize sales of its Xbox game console this holiday shopping season and counter competing motion-based gaming systems from Nintendo Co, which makes the Wii, and Sony Corp, which introduced its Move product two months ago.

"It's a strong start," said Don Mattrick, head of Microsoft's game unit, in a telephone interview on Monday. "Consumers are loving it."

The Kinect -- a sensing device you plug into the Xbox which allows you to play games just by moving your body and speaking commands -- is priced at $150 for a standalone unit and $300 bundled with a 4 gigabyte Xbox console.

It went on sale in U.S. stores November 4, although many customers had pre-ordered units, likely causing a spike in early sales. Microsoft is hoping sales will stay hot as the day after Thanksgiving -- one of the biggest shopping days of the year, known as 'Black Friday' -- approaches on November 26.

More than 30,000 U.S. stores are selling Kinect in the United States, including branches of Wal-Mart Stores Inc, Target Corp, Best Buy Co, GameStop Corp and online at Amazon.com. It went on sale on November 10 in Europe and is due to go on sale in Asia on November 18.

Ultimately, Microsoft is hoping the new technology will help extend the role of its Xbox 360, which has sold 45 million units, and introduce a concept that is expected to feature in forms of electronics and computers in the next few years.

Microsoft shares were trading unchanged after hours, after closing down 7 cents at $26.20 on Nasdaq.

(Reporting by Bill Rigby; Editing by Bernard Orr)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: UPDATE 1-Microsoft's Gates, Ballmer defend stock sales
entry.body:
* Chairman, CEO still retain large stakes

* CEO says insider selling not a drag on share price

* Shares down 0.5 percent (Adds byline, CEO comments)

By Bill Rigby

SEATTLE, Nov 16 (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp (MSFT.O) Chairman Bill Gates and Chief Executive Steve Ballmer defended recent stock sales on Tuesday as they faced tough questions from shareholders frustrated by the lack of growth in the company's shares over the past decade.

Gates, who co-founded the company in 1975, sells 20 million shares every quarter to help fund his philanthropic activities, while Ballmer is planning to sell 75 million shares by year end for tax planning reasons. [ID:nN05123079]

"Both Bill and I retain very substantial interests in the company," said Ballmer, CEO since 2000, at the company's annual shareholders meeting, which was broadcast on the Web. "If you look at the amount of shares sold by insiders it's really a very small percentage of all of the shares that sell, it's not a material factor in the stock price."

More than 50 million Microsoft shares change hands most days on Nasdaq, sometimes more than 100 million. The company has about 8.6 billion shares outstanding.

Gates is still the largest individual shareholder with about 7.2 percent of the company, followed by Ballmer with about 4 percent. Gates regularly sells shares in batches of 1 million to 4 million to fund his $33 billion Bill Melinda Gates Foundation, which became his focus when he retired from day-to-day work at Microsoft in 2008.

Asked by a shareholder if he could somehow annul his Microsoft shares, rather than selling them, Gates defended his priorities.

"I made that decision that wealth was going to go to the Foundation and the causes of the Foundation as opposed to being some reduction in shares outstanding for Microsoft," said Gates, in one of very few public utterances at the meeting.

Microsoft shares fell about 0.5 percent to $25.90 on Nasdaq. The shares are down about about 15 percent this year, compared to a 9 percent gain in the Nasdaq.

The stock has been trading around the same level as 2002. One shareholder complained that Microsoft's shares have been "wallowing" for years, to applause from the audience.

"I do understand the frustrations, we are all shareholders," replied Ballmer. "Ultimately the stock market gets it right, as long as we get it right."

The CEO praised his company's latest line-up of products, emphasizing the hot-selling Windows 7 operating system, but complained himself that investors tended to favor companies in the consumer electronics sphere.

"I don't think there's been as much appreciation for the incredible success we've had with enterprises," said Ballmer. "People relate better to the consumer market," he added. Apple Inc (AAPL.O), which has had a string of hits with its music players, phones and tablet devices, has seen its stock rise 25-fold in the last eight years.

Ballmer and Gates rejected one shareholder's appeal to consider breaking up Microsoft into smaller parts, in order to focus on individual businesses.

"I don't think it would be useful," said Ballmer, explaining that such a move would throw away the advantage of having different parts of its business working together.

(Reporting by Bill Rigby; Editing by Derek Caney, Bernard Orr)
